x_symbol.description: Set any style property for any number of elements. If an exception is thrown, and sProp=='display', and the browser is IE7 or down, and the element is one of the table elements, then assign 'block' or 'inline' based on tagName.

par.name: sProp
par.note: string - any valid style object property identifier. For example, "zIndex" and not "z-index".

par.name: sVal
par.note: string - a value to assign to sProp.

comment.author: mf
comment.note: This can be used instead of xColor, xBackground, xZIndex, xShow, xHide, xVisibility and xDisplay (which are no longer in X as of v4.16) - and has other uses.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Added the IE cc block for sProp=='display'.
